p.k: Actor Kataoka Ainosuke explores "The Battles of Coxinga" by Chikamatsu Monzaemon. It's an epic tale with a Sino-Japanese hero taking up arms in China for the family his father once served.
p.d: Dive into the world of Kabuki! Fascinating insights into this traditional Japanese theater. Famous plays, ornate costumes, make-up, scenery and more!
